name: Jack and Jerk: Off The Game
name_original: Jack and Jerk: Off The Game
description:
This is the scariest game ever made, anyone who plays this will be all like AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH when they play this game, it is that scary.... Also, if you ever stumble upon this page and don't download the game and play it, then Jack and Jerk will come to your house and make you go AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH. You have been warned... Also, enjoy the AMAZING 5D graphics. That's right, this ain't 2D, 3D, or 4D, it is 5D!

(Additionally, if you choose to use the source code to make your own Jack and Jerk: Off The Game fangames, please credit us.)

Credits:

  • The original concept: https://itch.io/profile/sebi-tv
  • Ideas and help: https://sxdg.itch.io/
  • Coding: https://coolingtool.itch.io/ 
  • Character design: ME!!!!

(I DIDN'T MAKE THE GAME YOU DUMMY IM JUST THE PUBLISHER AND CHARACTER DESIGNER!!)
